summary: June 25 is the 176th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Ian McDonald  is an English multi-instrumental musician, best known as a founding member of progressive rock group King Crimson, formed in 1969, and of the hard rock band Foreigner in 1976. He is well known as a rock session musician, predominantly as a saxophonist. He also plays keyboards, flute, vibraphone and guitar.
title: Ian McDonald (musician)
